reviews.text: The best pizza near the beach! My cousin and I where craving good pizza and they did not disappoint. We both had a pepperoni pizza combo (2 slices of pizza, and a drink)and they did not disappoint! A lot of people filtered in and out for lunch. We sat by the window side and built some legos. Delicious pizza will be returning! Small building with limited seating but such a cute place

Not what I had in mind when I thought of NY pizza! It was our first time here and I was expecting the big soft floppy crust slices that I had in NY city. I never visited the Bronx, so maybe this is more representative of what they serve there. The slices are small and the crust is crunchy, but they are very greasy like NYC ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

Quick service  and cashier was friendly. The lunch special 2 slices is fairly sized! The pizza tasted good, and the buffalo wings was cooked properly. Just limited dine-in seatings, but not a big deal.

Mostly smoke and mirrors. Honestly very over rated.  Ordered a pepperoni pizza.  It's just ok. Very salty,  sauce is canned. Also ordered a meatball sandwich and a side of meatballs those were the biggest disappointment. Taste like those packaged meatballs you get from Costco.... Better choices around town.

My wife and I LOVED this little pizza joint. Authentic New York pizza, down to the paper plates too. My wife lived in the Bronx, and this pizza is the real thing. Mozzarella sticks are great too. Generous portions with the salads. I wish this place was right next to my house.

editorial_summary.overview: Local pizzeria chain serving NY-style pies in a low-key, retro setting. Some offer beer & wine.

recentReviews.text: Great NY style, dare to say the best in Orange County. Try it!
Placed an order for one slice of pizza, the special of the house. However, I received four slices and the manager said it was on the house. Best pizza I‚Äôve ever had minus the calories.

Place inside was too hot. People taking the orders take too long and often not focused on the customer. And most importantly, the pizza didn‚Äôt really taste good. The quality isn‚Äôt great. I honestly expected more from this place.
Great service and wonderful ingrediants,unique pies and great staff.

detailedReviews.author: Gerardo Hilera
detailedReviews.text: Great NY style, dare to say the best in Orange County. Try it!

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Eaton
detailedReviews.text: Placed an order for one slice of pizza, the special of the house. However, I received four slices and the manager said it was on the house. Best pizza I‚Äôve ever had minus the calories.

detailedReviews.author: Mauricio Loza
detailedReviews.text: Place inside was too hot. People taking the orders take too long and often not focused on the customer. And most importantly, the pizza didn‚Äôt really taste good. The quality isn‚Äôt great. I honestly expected more from this place.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Great service and wonderful ingrediants,unique pies and great staff.

detailedReviews.author: Antonio Martinez
detailedReviews.text: Delicious Pizza!! Chicken Alfredo!!

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Coles
detailedReviews.text: Yummy food, welcoming environment!

detailedReviews.author: Leslie Alva
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza near the beach! My cousin and I where craving good pizza and they did not disappoint. We both had a pepperoni pizza combo (2 slices of pizza, and a drink)and they did not disappoint! A lot of people filtered in and out for lunch. We sat by the window side and built some legos. Delicious pizza will be returning! Small building with limited seating but such a cute place

detailedReviews.author: Telvis L
detailedReviews.text: Definitely has improved a lot. Crust is way crispier than it used to be to be about a year ago. ü§ô

detailedReviews.author: sergio cruz
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly and cozy lil spot, the pizzas r very delicious specially the vegan one!üòãüòãüëåüèºüëçüèº

detailedReviews.author: Jen Kitty
detailedReviews.text: Not what I had in mind when I thought of NY pizza! It was our first time here and I was expecting the big soft floppy crust slices that I had in NY city. I never visited the Bronx, so maybe this is more representative of what they serve there. The slices are small and the crust is crunchy, but they are very greasy like NYC ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

detailedReviews.author: Cristina Greenway Perez
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is amazing! The staff is always super friendly and kind; they helped me carry the pizzas to my car the last time I ordered carry out üòä

detailedReviews.author: J
detailedReviews.text: The pizza slices are very large, taste great, and are pretty good value

detailedReviews.author: Mike Hamilton (Mikey)
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and antipasto salad. A Newport Beach classic!

detailedReviews.author: M Hause
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm not one to give bad reviews but we ordered delivery from their website and had a terrible experience. Firstly, their system glitched and we had to call them and their app‚Äôs customer support to manually push the order in to the restaurant (I don‚Äôt blame them for this, it was just frustrating). After they confirmed the order, the original estimate of 20-40 minutes got pushed to an hour. We called again just to confirm there weren‚Äôt any other issues, and they informed us it would be an additional 20 minutes past our expected delivery time. So in total they took 1hr and 45mins from the time we ordered to when we received the food and we had to call them and their customer service 5 times. They also said they wouldn‚Äôt give us any more than $10 refund on our $140 order for all the issues. Unfortunately the food was pretty good but I wouldn‚Äôt order online from here ever again.

detailedReviews.author: Joel Corral
detailedReviews.text: Mostly smoke and mirrors. Honestly very over rated.  Ordered a pepperoni pizza.  It's just ok. Very salty,  sauce is canned. Also ordered a meatball sandwich and a side of meatballs those were the biggest disappointment. Taste like those packaged meatballs you get from Costco.... Better choices around town.

detailedReviews.author: Carlo Angelo Ignacio
detailedReviews.text: Quick service  and cashier was friendly. The lunch special 2 slices is fairly sized! The pizza tasted good, and the buffalo wings was cooked properly. Just limited dine-in seatings, but not a big deal.

detailedReviews.author: Mac Barton (M B)
detailedReviews.text: Great slice shop with kids.  Large slices.  Combos are great.  Our favorite was the Caesar Salad.

detailedReviews.author: marvin mane
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza slices are huge! Very good
Chicken Cesar salad is fire!

detailedReviews.author: Linda Colleran
detailedReviews.text: Johnny's is our Fave pizza/Wings place.  We always order takeout and the wings are the best around, as is the chicken Caesar salad...soo good.  Always busy cuz food is fantastic. And pizza is delish!

detailedReviews.author: Connie Ilg
detailedReviews.text: A few spots in rear of place often available for pickups. A few tables with umbrellas up front on sidewalk.  Busy area, good people and car watching.  Pizza Solid, 8 stars of 10. Good overall, tip well !

detailedReviews.author: M Z
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious and great service!

detailedReviews.author: M Bayha
detailedReviews.text: I stopped in for a slice of pizza while in CA on business. I'm from NY and Johnny's in Corona del Mar definitely comes very close to what I would expect to get in NY. They make NY style pizza within walking distance of Corona Del Mar beach. This pizzeria is excellent and is by far the best pizza I have found in CA so far!

detailedReviews.author: Christian Cernich
detailedReviews.text: Great lunch special two slices and a chicken caesar

detailedReviews.author: Ameen
detailedReviews.text: I feel like the pizza here just lacks flavor, particularly the dough

detailedReviews.author: Jay C
detailedReviews.text: As good as it get outside of NYC. I love stopping here for just a slice of cheese and pepperoni.

detailedReviews.author: Melissa Aguilera
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delicious, mozzarella sticks yum the pull on them you can tell it's fresh fresh.  My friend doesn't like pizza but said he would be back. Definitely recommend trying üëå

detailedReviews.author: Benjamin Lebedin
detailedReviews.text:
Ordered wigs well done, crispy. They were perfect

Pizza is the best in the area. Not even close

detailedReviews.author: Gon Choi
detailedReviews.text: Super friendly staff and delicious food! The wings are a must try!!

detailedReviews.author: tiffanie graham
detailedReviews.text: Straight forward pizza with a good taste. Huge cut slices so if you‚Äôre sharing I recommend telling them to cut them normal size (if you‚Äôre sharing with kids). Buffalo Wings had a really good flavor. I highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Anna Garifine
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza! Some great specialty pies and the large pizza was huge!

detailedReviews.author: Lee Solow
detailedReviews.text:
They are the best pizza in Corona Del Mar!
Perfect sauce, extra thin crust, and just perfect.

detailedReviews.author: erik backess
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs better than most pizza places in California, a state famous for it‚Äôs lack of good pizza places. This is definitely not New York Style pizza. Like others it‚Äôs obvious that they use California tap water for the dough. You can tell on the look and the taste of the crust. Good for California - pretty bad for New York. I had high hopes reading up on previous reviews - but like 9/10 times eating a pizza in Cali it‚Äôs a disappointment.

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Fletcher
detailedReviews.text: Tastes like New York, $5.80 for a slice though

detailedReviews.author: Joe Palladino
detailedReviews.text: Can honestly say Johnny's has the absolute best pizza I have ever eaten. The wings, salad and dressings are also awesome. Craving never goes away.

detailedReviews.author: Manny Miranda
detailedReviews.text:
So I am five stars across the board.

The gentlemen working there are really nice people and genuine.

The reason for my restart regarding the atmosphere is that you get a lot of stuck of people in the area.

The pizza was absolutely amazing. I had some veggies and some sausage on my slice of pizza.

All the ingredients were fresh and the pizza do was amazing. The bottom of the pizza was nicely toasted. That's when you know pizza is being done right.

If I lived any closer.I would make this my once or twice a week routine stops.

The prices were amazing!
And yes, once again, the pizza was was like those classic pizza places. You go to when you were a kid..

detailedReviews.author: Charcoal Junkie
detailedReviews.text: Stopped by for two slices it was good but not great.   I would go back for sure!

detailedReviews.author: S C
detailedReviews.text: Bad bizza bad service

detailedReviews.author: Alan Steinfeld
detailedReviews.text:
Great Pizza and their salads are the bomb..
Highly recommend you try..

detailedReviews.author: Emmanuel Quijas
detailedReviews.text: Love it all, roll through..!

detailedReviews.author: Angel Rincon
detailedReviews.text: Pizza tasted great and was reasonably priced. I grabbed a pepperoni slice and tried garlic knots. Not much to say other than nice staff and I loved the adorable photos framed along the wall. I didn‚Äôt photograph because of the other patrons, but trust me they‚Äôre cute. We sat outside due to no open seats and sat along the tables outside by the road near some parking spots. Yeah, ps parking might take a while because there is no lot but it didn‚Äôt take long to find a spot and yeah we just had to walk within the same block. Would love to try again.

detailedReviews.author: Nick
detailedReviews.text: 10 years and it still gets better. Great food, super cool staff.

detailedReviews.author: Wesley Han
detailedReviews.text: I ate an entire calzone in one sitting and I don't know how.

detailedReviews.author: Jason Blakemore
detailedReviews.text: This place is amazing yummy slices their wings are to die for.

detailedReviews.author: Hugh Nelson
detailedReviews.text: First time i can remember trying NY style pizza. Love the pizza not about breadstick size crust. Just enough. Slices are large. Pizza had tons of flavor. Compared to your bready fast take out pizza places. Its more, but you are paying for quality. Will be back

detailedReviews.author: Neil Kwiatkowski
detailedReviews.text: Best NY style pizza in OC by a mile

detailedReviews.author: Mickey Deutsch
detailedReviews.text: My wife and I LOVED this little pizza joint. Authentic New York pizza, down to the paper plates too. My wife lived in the Bronx, and this pizza is the real thing. Mozzarella sticks are great too. Generous portions with the salads. I wish this place was right next to my house.

detailedReviews.author: ANTONIO PATINO
detailedReviews.text: First time eating here, but definitely not the last. We came to beach from inland empire and just happen to stumble across this place and boy are we happy we did. We had the best BBQ pizza I've ever had and don't even get me started on the wings. The wings were crispy and sauced to perfection, we had the sweet chili, bbq, and buffalo. The pizza is your traditional NY style but they use a deck oven so if you know you know. For those who don't deck ovens are the ones that give the pizza a delicious crunch on the dough. The staff was awesome and the shop was really clean even with so many people being there. We are definitely stopping by again anytime we're in the area, heck we may make the 1.5 hour drive just when we have pizza and wing craving. It's that good!!

detailedReviews.author: Edward Hernandez
detailedReviews.text: The wings were so good!!! Also the pizza is very light and I don't feel heavy.

detailedReviews.author: Rajan Bhakta
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza in orange county hands down. This is a must try pizza joint the cheese slice is extra crispy and spicy. A slice of New York in California

detailedReviews.author: Ana De Leon
detailedReviews.text: D: We ordered the six wing pieces spicy barbecue. We also ordered two slices of the meat lover. We added mushrooms for 50 cents more. We also got a tiramisu. The price is so affordable. It‚Äôs a really great price for the size of the slice. The extra 50 cents for the mushroom was so worth it. They put good amount of mushroom! The water cup is free. The pizza is really good. The wings were good. Just a little dry. The sauce of the wings was really good. Perfect mixture of spicy and sweet. The pizza was really Big. Not greasy at all. The meats were really good. The tiramisu was delicious! It was the best part of my dinner. The price and food were perfect for three people. I paid 28$ for 2 slices of meat love with mushroom, 6 piece wing, and the tiramisu. I am definitely coming back.

detailedReviews.author: Kaddee Phillips
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza would highly recommend this place it was fast easy and not to mention packed and they were still able to get our food out so quick!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tracie Rotter
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! Delicious ny-style pizza and they‚Äôre fast w orders

detailedReviews.author: Steve Kocsis
detailedReviews.text: Amazing pizza and wings and a great atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: THERESA Khouri
detailedReviews.text: Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Austin Fletcher
detailedReviews.text:
Not bad...  First order could have been better, though.  Pizza was cold and delivered upside down.  They more than made up for it  with a free amazing meal and AMAZING customer service.  Went into the store and was taken care of.  Their white sauce pie was great.

Wings were the best part.

detailedReviews.author: Ehsan Tavakkol
detailedReviews.text: Lovely staff

detailedReviews.author: Adil Hussain
detailedReviews.text: Delicious NY style pizza. You can't eat just one slice!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Jaen
detailedReviews.text:
I caught the sign of this place driving down PCH, heading to Crystal Cove, and being from The Bronx, I HAD to stop in and check it out for myself. Well, I'm floored. This is the most authentic/accurate flavor and texture of "NY Style" Pizza I've had in SoCal. I don't know how they did it, but I would argue this is legitimately indistinguishable from the real deal. Add to that the fact that for $5 you get "two" slices (they're comically oversized). I'm absolutely coming back.

I'm infinitely curious what it is they do different here at Johnny's from every other "NY Style" spot I've been in SoCal. These other places are always somewhat close, but never quite there. Johnny's is so incredibly spot on, that I would believe it if they got shipments from back East and they don't even make them here! ü§£
I need to speak to the owner and find out how they did it. Maybe they import NYC water? lol

Update: Still Bomb as ever! I recently went to New York and had pizza before I left. Soon as I got home I came here to try and compare as soon as possible while it was fresh in my mind... I can honestly say this place even beats most NY Places in terms of taste. I also decided to try the Calzone and Chicken Parm Hero and both options were Delicious. This place doesn't miss. Strongly Recommend!!!

detailedReviews.author: Emily Nicholas
detailedReviews.text: Loved the house salad! Huge with tons of toppings and we got the small. We also got the Fontaine pizza but for some reason we‚Äôre overcharged. It was good but I wasn‚Äôt a fan of the hard crust. The service was super friendly and I‚Äôd definitely go back to get the salad and try other things. We went back the next day to get a lunch special and I liked the pizza more and the honey bbq wings were so good. The bad news is the fountain drinks have no diet options. They were nice and let me get a Diet Coke out of the fridge. The slice on the lunch special was huge . Highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Dragos Neagu
detailedReviews.text: Moses had an amazing friendly vibe. The pizza was authentic, fresh, and delicious! We had the slice of the day pepperoni and sausage, and a small Alfredo pizza with double mushroom.

detailedReviews.author: Tal ‚ÄúTC‚Äù Cohen
detailedReviews.text: I've been buying pizza from them for a long time. As someone from New York, I can say it's the closest you can get to authentic NY pizza around here. The service is fantastic‚Äîwhen I call in an order, it's ready by the time I arrive. If you're curious, the 20-inch pizza is enormous and truly NY style.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Finelt
detailedReviews.text: Born in the Bronx and raised in New York City ‚Äî- this is the real deal.  So damn good.  Thank you for bringing a slice of home to CDM!

detailedReviews.author: christina bazazo
detailedReviews.text: Fair price and portions. Being from NY it's hard to find good pizza in Cali. The pizza is delish!!!

detailedReviews.author: Erika Weber
detailedReviews.text: Food took a lot longer than quoted. Wish the pizza would have been cut into smaller slices.

detailedReviews.author: Shane Thompson
detailedReviews.text: The pizza and mozzarella sticks are pretty good. I recommend the mozzarella sticks but I wouldn't wait until you get home to eat them.

detailedReviews.author: Rick Perry
detailedReviews.text: Definitely worth the trip for an amazing pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Ty Salerno
detailedReviews.text: Called for lunch special 2-3 minutes after 4pm and they didn‚Äôt honor it. Disappointed. Just a heads up. Don‚Äôt call late I guess‚Ä¶

detailedReviews.author: P Zu√±iga
detailedReviews.text: Was craving pizza, so checked this place out. Service was great! Cool little spot. Pizza was a little too salty for me, not sure if that's normal here, since it was my 1st time eating there.

detailedReviews.author: Shahar Badani (The key locksmith)
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food

detailedReviews.author: D Ro
detailedReviews.text: This place has Great NY style pizza. Nice and thin, crispy undercarriage and perfectly chewy. Best I've tried in the area. Tried the house salad also which was pretty good. The only disappointment were the cinnamon knots. Super chewy and hard, so cannot recommend. Everything else was spectacular...except parking. Good luck with that and may the force be with you.

detailedReviews.author: Diana G
detailedReviews.text:
3/24/24 UPDATE- downgrading again but now will NOT be back.  After 2 bad pizzas through uber eats i called direct for a pickup; was told ‚Äú1 hour 15 mins to 1.5 hours for pickup; asked about delivery: ‚Äúhour thirty to
hour and 45 mins‚Äù this is on a Saturday nite at 7PM.  wont be trying again.
2/23/24 UPDATE - downgrading my review on the food to a 4 because I have had take away twice since my previous post and both times the pizza was not that great. I ordered the same thing that I always order so I‚Äôm not comparing apples to oranges here I‚Äôm comparing exactly the same thing. I will try one more time but then that will be it if the quality doesn‚Äôt improve.
//

üçïüçïüçïüçïüçïgreat(!) local pizzeria.  good portions (20-in pizza shown here); so good i ordered the same thing the very next day LOL!

detailedReviews.author: Jerry Pantages
detailedReviews.text:
Excellent pizza, just like or as close as you‚Äôre going to get like NY pizza, very impressed!!!
Fries were awesome also!!

detailedReviews.author: E T
detailedReviews.text:
I love this pizza spot!!!
It is SO good.
Cheesy, good marina sauce and never floppy pizza :)
Love coming here on my lunch breaks and sitting outside

detailedReviews.author: Greg Short
detailedReviews.text: This is my favorite pizza, we eat there once or twice every time we come down for a week.

detailedReviews.author: Michie LiL
detailedReviews.text: My family enjoyed the buffalo chicken pizza & sweet chile wings. Service was good & place was clean. Worth the 10 minute drive from where I was staying. I'd stop by if I'm in the area again. Cheers!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the generous portions and value of the pizza slices, often mentioning the large size and great taste. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and helpful staff consistently enhance the dining experience, with customers appreciating their kindness and assistance. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The unique and delicious pizza offerings, such as the vegan options and special house slices, are a hit with customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues regarding food quality and service - review management can address this concern
Poor online visibility and competition with other pizza places - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Gerardo Hilera
positive.text: Great NY style, dare to say the best in Orange County. Try it!

neutral.author: Mauricio Loza
neutral.text: Place inside was too hot. People taking the orders take too long and often not focused on the customer. And most importantly, the pizza didn‚Äôt really taste good. The quality isn‚Äôt great. I honestly expected more from this place.

Also ordered a meatball sandwich and a side of meatballs those were the biggest disappointment. Taste like those packaged meatballs you get from Costco.... Better choices around town.

They also said they wouldn‚Äôt give us any more than $10 refund on our $140 order for all the issues. Unfortunately the food was pretty good but I wouldn‚Äôt order online from here ever again.

negative.text: I feel like the pizza here just lacks flavor, particularly the dough

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
